title: Function Concepts - Tabular and Analytic Part B

content.question: Part B (i) Find all values of \(x\), as decimal approximations, for which \(g\left(x\right)=3\), or indicate there are no such values. (ii) Determine the end behavior of \(g\) as \(x\) decreases without bound. Express your answer using the mathematical notation of a limit.

frqParts.text: Part B (i) Find all values of \(x\), as decimal approximations, for which \(g\left(x\right)=3\), or indicate there are no such values. (ii) Determine the end behavior of \(g\) as \(x\) decreases without bound. Express your answer using the mathematical notation of a limit.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
